Empieza su actividad comercial desde las 6 de la mañana ofreciendo sus productos de primera necesidad a usuarios del transporte intermunicipal de la ciudad de León que es donde ella vive.

 La señora Yasmin utilizará el crédito solicitado para la compra de uniformes escolares, cuadernos, lapiceros ya que se acerca la temporada en la que los estudiantes entraran a clases. También comprará las cremas corporales así como el shampoo. La señora Yasmin está sumamente agradecida con Ceprodel por el apoyo que  obtendrá del crédito puesto que este le será de mucha bendición para su desarrollo.
texts.en:
Yasmin Esperanza is single and sells cosmetics and other personal hygiene products like body creams, shampoo and perfume.  She starts her commercial activity at 6 in the morning offering her basic need items to passengers on inter-municipal buses in the city of León which is where she lives.

Yasmin will use the loan to buy school uniforms, notebooks and mechanical pencils because the season when students start classes is approaching.  She will also buy body creams and shampoo.  Yasmin is extremely grateful to Ceprodel for the support she’ll get from the loan because it will be a great blessing for her development.

loans.use: to buy merchandise at wholesale.

loans.name: Josefa De Jesús

texts.es:
Josefa de Jesús es  casada y se dedica a la actividad de venta de verduras ofreciendo su producto en el mercado la terminal. Inicia sus labores desde las 5:00 de la mañana y finalizándolas a las 6:00 de la tarde.

La señora Josefa de Jesús utilizará el crédito solicitado para la compra de plátano, chayotes, yuca, cebollas, quequisque, tomates, zanahorias, azúcar, arroz, aceite, frijoles, jabón, ace, cloro y especies al por mayor.

La señora Josefa está sumamente agradecida con Ceprodel por el apoyo que obtendrá del crédito puesto que este le será de mucha bendición para su desarrollo.
texts.en: Josefa de Jesús is married and works selling vegetables at the market at the bus station.  She starts work at 5am and finishes at 6pm.  She will use the requested loan to buy bananas, chayote, manioc, onions, “quequisque” [starchy tuber], tomatoes, carrots, sugar, rice, oil, beans, soap, Ace brand detergent and spices at wholesale.  Josefa is extremely grateful to Ceprodel for the support she’ll get from the loan because it will be a big blessing for her development.

loans.use: to buy vegetables.

loans.name: Henrry Marcelino

texts.es: El socio Henrry Marcelino; continua con su trabajo en construcción en diferentes obras, el socio esta ahorrando dentro de sus grupo y paralelamente a esto juegan todos los miembros pandero que es un modo de ahorrar obligadamente y con el cero porciento de interes lo que a el le permite seguir creciendo, el socio desea invertir el prestamo en la compra de herramientas, el socio comprara nuevas herramientas como cerrucho, matillo, carretilla, taladro entre otros.
texts.en:
The member Henrry Marcelino continues with his work in construction at various job sites. The member is saving within his group and, in parallel fashion, along with all the members he participates in pandero [a cooperative savings program] which is a mandatory savings method with zero percent interest, which allows him to continue growing. 

The member wishes to invest the loan in the purchase of tools. He will buy new tools such as a handsaw, hammer, wheelbarrow and drills among others.

loans.use: to purchase new tools such as a handsaw, hammer, wheelbarrow and drill among others.

loans.name: Papa Moustapha

texts.fr: L'emprunteur est une jeune qui exerce le transport urbain par motocyclette.Il est dans ce métier depuis un an.Il est célibataire mai a la charge de ses deux parents ainsi que ses frères et sœurs qui vont à l'école.Il est employé comme salarié par le propriétaire de la motocyclette qui lui remet chaque soir le tiers de la recette journalière.Ce modeste montant lui permet tant bien que mal de supporter les dépenses d'alimentation de la famille et les frais scolaires de ses frères et sœurs.Aujourd'hui, il voudrait acquérir sa propre moto et maximiser ainsi ses revenus.C'est pour cela qu'il sollicite un pret de 400000f pour acheter une nouvelle motocyclette.Son ambition est de construire sa propre maison.
texts.en:
The borrower is a young men who provides motorcycle transportation services in the city. He's been doing this job for one year. He's single, but has to support his two parents and his siblings, who attend school.

He's employed for a wage by the owner of the motorcycle, who gives him every evening one third of the daily takings. This small amount of money more or less enables him to cover the family's food expenses, and the school expenses of his siblings.

At this time, he would like to purchase his own motorcycle, and thus maximize his income. For this reason, he's seeking a loan of XOF 400'000 in order to purchase a new motorcycle. He ambitions to build his own house.

loans.use: to purchase a new motorcycle

loans.name: Mass

texts.fr:
Monsieur Mass est un jeune marchand d’œufs  âgé de 34 ans, célibataire, sans enfants. Il a une expérience de quatre ans dans ce domaine.
Avec le crédit, il envisage d’acheter 125 plateaux d’œufs à 1650fcfa le plateau afin de l’écouler dans le marché local.
Monsieur Mass n’a pratiquement pas de charges sinon sa restauration ; ce qui lui permet d’épargner  pour  pouvoir réaliser son vœu.
Ses projets pour l’avenir seraient d’avoir son propre poulailler de poulets pondeurs et d’y associer la vente d’aliments bétails.
texts.en:
Mr. Mass, aged 34, is a young unmarried merchant who sells eggs. He has four years of experience in this domain. With this loan, he envisions buying 125 trays of eggs at 1,650 francs CFA per tray in order to sell them at the local market. 

Mr. Mass has practically no expenses except for his restaurant, which enables him to save money to realize his dream. 

His projects for the future would be to have his own chicken coop for egg-laying hens and to include the sale of animal feed.

loans.use: to buy eggs to resell at the local market

loans.name: Cirjano Raul

texts.es:
Cirjano de 41 años, se dedica a realizar el servicio e mecánico en mantenimiento de moto taxis y autos de las distintas marcas y modelos vigentes en el Perú, se dedica a esta actividad hace aproximadamente 2 años, en este lapso de tiempo hasta la actualidad, la cantidad de moto taxis se han incrementado y fue este uno de los motivos por el que Cirjano se entusiasmo y decidió brindar este tipo de servicio a los ciudadanos de Pisco, provincia que fue azotada en el año 2007 por un terrible terremoto, noticia que fue difundida a nivel mundial por la cantidad de daños y pérdidas que sufrió dicha ciudad.

Por suerte, Cirjano ya sabía cómo reparar este tipo de vehículos porque tomo cursos especiales y esto le ha ayudado mucho a desarrollarse profesionalmente en este ámbito, el trabaja día a día con la finalidad de lograr tener los ingresos necesarios para su esposa y su menor hijo, esta labor es muy esforzada y es por eso que siempre termina muy sucio, aún así continúa y continúa.

Cirjano desea que los prestatarios Kiva puedan ayudarlo y así el pueda adquirir una máquina de soldar y un taladro, los mismo que le facilitaran el trabajo debido a que los suyos ya son muy viejitos y ya no puede darle el mismo uso de antes, Cirjano sabe que con esta ayuda el podrá agilizar y mejorar su trabajo permitiéndose atender a muchos más clientes y asegurarse de que estos regresaran. Este hombre se siente muy agradecido con Dios por la oportunidad que le brindan de progresar no solo como ser humano sino también que su familia continuará desarrollándose. Su gran meta por ahora es poder brindarle mayores comodidades a su familia y hacer que su hijo sea un gran profesional.
texts.en:
Cirjano is 42 and works as mechanic, maintaining mototaxis and various makes and models of cars found in Peru. He has had this livelihood for approximately two years. In this period of time and until now, the quantity of mototaxis has increased, and this was one of the reasons why Cirjano got excited about the idea and decided to offer this type of service to the citizens of Pisco.

This province was hit with a terrible earthquake in 2007; news that spread around the world because of the amount of damage and loss that the city suffered. Luckily Cirjano already knew how to repair this type of vehicle, because he took special courses, and this has really helped him to develop professionally in this field.

He works day after day, with the aim of managing to have the income necessary for his wife and minor child. This work is very hard, and that is why he always ends up very dirty. Even so, he keeps on going. 

Cirjano hopes the Kiva lenders can help him, so he can acquire a welding machine and a drill. These will make the work easier, due to the fact that his own are now very old, and he can't give them the same use as before. Cirjano knows that with this help, he will be able to speed up and improve his work, allowing him to serve many more clients, and ensuring that they come back.

This man feels very grateful to God for the opportunity he is being offered to progress; not only as a human being, but also in the sense that his family will continue to move forward.

His great goal for now is to be able to provide greater comfort to his family and to have his son be a fine professional.

loans.use: To buy a welding machine and a drill.

loans.name: Gie Dinguiraye Youssoupha 2 Group

texts.fr: Le "GIE dinguiraye youssoupha 2" est constitué de deux jeunes femmes , mariées qui exercent le commerce de produits alimentaires. Le chef du groupe(en blanc), est mère de deux enfants, dont l'un fréquente l'école primaire. Chaque matin, elle arpente les rues de sa ville, pour proposer à domicile du lait caillé qu'elle transporte dans un grand bocal posé sur sa tête.Les recettes qu'elle obtient lui permettent d'acheter du riz, du poisson et d'autres condiments pour préparer le déjeuner , une fois revenu chez elle, au milieu de la journée.Pour augmenter leurs fonds de commerce, les deux femmes sollicitent un prêt de 250 000f afin d'acheter des sacs de lait en poudre.Leur ambition est de s'installer au marché central de leur ville.
texts.en:
The group "GIE dinguiraye youssoupha 2" is comprised of two young married women who work selling food. The head of the group (in white) is the mother of two children, one of whom attends primary school. 

Each morning, she walks up and down the streets of her city to offer to households curdled milk which she transports in a large jar placed upon her head. The income she brings in enables her to buy rice, fish, and other items to make lunch once she is back home during the day.

To increase their business funds, the two women are requesting a loan of 250,000 francs CFA to buy bags of powdered milk. Their ambition is to become situated at the central market of their city.

loans.use: to buy bags of powdered milk

loans.name: Gie Dinguiraye Youssoupha 1 Group

texts.fr: Le groupe "GIE dinguiraye youssoupha 1" est composé de deux femmes mariées.Elles habitent dans la même maison et se sont réunies pour s'appuyer mutuellement.Elles pratiquent la même activité: la vente de poisson frais et de légumes;l'une  au marché centrale et l'autre devant leur domicile.Elles obtiennent chaque jour des recettes assez modestes qui leurs permettent de prendre en charge les frais de nourritures du lendemain. Le chef du groupe, en foulard rouge, propose à ses clients, du poisson frais, des arachides, des haricots et des légumes qu'elle vend étale sur une table, installée juste à la porte de la maison.Elle est mère de quatre enfants dont les trois vont à l'école. Ain de renforcer leur fonds de commerce, elle sollicitent un pret de 250000f pour acheter des produits agricoles et des produits halieutiques.Leur ambition es d'élargir leur activité.
texts.en:
The group "GIE dinguiraye youssoupha 1" is comprised of two married women who live in the same house. They came together for mutual support and have the same work selling fresh fish and vegetables. One of them makes her sales at the central market, and the other, in front of her home. Each day, they earn rather modest incomes that enable them to cover their food costs for the next day.

The head of the group, who is wearing a red scarf, offers her customers fresh fish, peanuts, beans, and vegetables displayed on a table set up just outside the door of her house. She is a mother of four children, of whom three attend school. 

To bolster their business capital, she is requesting a loan of 250,000 francs CFA to buy farm products and seafood products. Their ambition is to expand their business.

loans.use: to buy farm products and seafood products

loans.name: Ana Cristina

texts.es:
Ana es una mujer de 28 años, se considera una persona alegre, amabable, responsable en su trabajo y carismática con sus clientes. Ana vive con su esposo y su hijo de 9 años en la ciudad de Ibarra de la Provincia de Imbabura.

Ana trabaja con una socia en una cafetería, venden humitas, quimbolitos y tamales que son comidas tradicionales de Ecuador las cuales son hechas a base de maíz tierno, también venden café y té. Es el tercer crédito que solicita a Fodemi, el mismo que será invertido en la compra de vajillas, parasoles y dos juegos de mesas para atenderles mejor a sus clientes. Esta inversión permitirá a Ana a incrementar su negocio y a obtener más clientes y así podrá obtener ingresos para sustentar los gastos de su hogar.

Ana sueña con administrar su propio local y poder generar fuentes de empleo.
texts.en:
Ana is a woman of 28. She considers herself a cheerful person, friendly, responsible in her work, and able to charm her customers. Ana lives with her husband and 9-year-old child in the city of Ibarra, in Imbabura province. 

Ana works with a partner in a coffee shop, selling quimbolitos (sweet cake steamed in an achira leaf), tamales, and humitas (another type of tamale). These are traditional Ecuadorian foods made from young corn. They also sell coffee and tea.

This is the third loan that Ana is applying to Fodemi for. She will use it to buy dishes, sunshades, and two table sets, in order to serve her customers better. This investment will will allow Ana to increase her business and get more customers. This way she will be able to earn income to meet her household expenses. 

Ana dreams about running her own place and being able to generate sources of employment.

loans.use: To buy dishes, sunshades, and two tables sets.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La socia  continua con el trabajo de la carpinteria, la socia hace las labores mas senciallas y siempre utiles dentro del taller, ella tambien ve las cobranzas y lleva la contabilidad un poco precaria pero ahy la lleva, la socia en esta ocasión desea invertir el credito en la compra de madera para la fabricacion de muebles para vender, la socia tambien comprara cerrucho, clavos entre otros menores.
texts.en: This member continues with her carpentry work. She does the simplest and always useful tasks in the workshop. She also sees to collections and keeps the books, a bit precariously but there she keeps them. On this occasion the member wants to invest the loan in the purchase of wood to make furniture to sell. The member will also buy a handsaw and nails among other minor items.

loans.use: to buy wood to make furniture to sell as well as a handsaw and nails among other minor items.

loans.name: Carolina Enriqueta

texts.es: La  socia  Carolina, continua con la administracion de sus tienda de abarrotes, ella implementa su negocio cada tres a cuatro meses en general todos los productos, pero cada 20 dias  a 30 dias al mes ella aumenta mercaderia; la socia en esta ocasion tambien desea implementar su negocio con la compra de arroz, azucar, harinas, leche, fideos, aceite, entre otros productos de primera necesidad osea los productos que salen a diario. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de productos de primera necesidad como harinas, fideos, aceite, leche, azucar, arroz.
texts.en: Carolina continues running her grocery store. Every three or four months she rotates merchandise but every 20 to 30 days she increases her merchandise. On this occasion she wants to purchase rice, sugar, flours, milk, noodles, oil and other products that are purchased daily. She is asking for the loan to purchase flours, noodles, oil, milk, sugar, and rice.

loans.use: to purchase flour, noodles, oil, milk, sugar, and rice

loans.name: Fortunata

texts.es:
La socia se seigue dedicando al negocio de piscigranja,ella vende truchas y pescados y lo lleva a los diferentes lugares como Anta,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el ngeocio de piscigranja. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar alimentos para los peces y truchas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: This borrower is still working in the fish farming business, selling trout and fish. She takes the fish to different places like Anta. She works from 8:00 am until 6:00 pm, and this work has allowed her to help her children get ahead. Her dream is to expand her fish farming business. She is asking for a loan to buy feed for fish and trout. She is happy about the loan and committed to making the payments on times.

loans.use: buy feed for fish and trout

loans.name: Juana Gregoria

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando a la venta de verduras y negocio de venta de animales,ella vende arbeja,pasto,habas y cebollas,ella vende en el mercado desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m y los animales lo vende en las diferentes ferias que existe en el distrito de Anta,el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde puede vender las verduras y animales.La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar arbejas,habas y cebollas y tambien para comprar alimentos para los animales.
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member continues working selling vegetables and animals.  She sells peas, grass, beans, and onions, in the market from 8:00 a.m. until 6:00 p.m.  She sells the animals in different markets in the Anta district.  Her dream is to have a place where she can sell vegetables and animals.

The member is requesting the loan to buy peas, beans, and onions, and also feed for the animals.  She is happy about the loan and promises to make the payments on time.

loans.use: to buy peas, beans, and onions, and feed for the animals.

loans.name: Martina

texts.es: Con su credikiva anterior compró  Maíz, carne, pollo, huevos e hizo mantenimiento a su estufa y a su enfriador, ahora está mas tranquila, porque todo marcha bien, pero con ganas de seguir mejorando; su meta actual es lograr un ambiente mucho mas confortable para ella y sus clientes, por eso está aplicando a su credikiva, con el cual adecuará su espacio locativo, comprará materias primas e insumos y un nuevo enfriador para aumentar su espacio de refrigeración pues en el anterior, sus carnes y verduras no caben. Con esta inversión se sentirá mucho mejor, porque poco a poco, va logrando que su negocio se vea con las condiciones que requiere el manejo de alimentos,  las carnes con una refrigeración adecuada, además de que obtendrá descuentos por compras en mayor volumen y esto es justamente lo que garantiza el éxito de la inversión. Su mensaje a los financiadores de Kiva es el siguiente: “Su apoyo es muy importante,   están dándole apoyo al pequeño empresario para que salga adelante y pueda cumplir sus sueños para sacar adelante a su familia. “
texts.en: With her last CrediKiva, Martina purchased maize, meat, chicken and eggs, and carried out some maintenance to her stove and her cooler. Now she is in a less stressful situation, because everything is in good working order, but she still has hopes to improve her position. Her current goal is to achieve a more comfortable environment for herself and her customers, so she is asking for a loan to renovate her place of work. She will buy basic materials and a new cooler to increase her refrigeration space, because there is not enough space for currently her meat and vegetables. With this investment she will feel much more positive because, little by little, she is managing to bring her business to the appropriate standards for handling food; the meat will be properly refrigerated and she will also be able to obtain discounts for buying in greater volume, something which guarantees the success of her investment. Her message to Kiva's lenders is the following: ' Your support is very important. You are giving help to small business owners so that they can move forward and achieve their dreams of giving a good life to their families.'

loans.use: To renovate her place of work by buying basic materials and a new cooler.

loans.name: Cesar Augusto

texts.es:
Cesar Augusto tiene 35 años de edad es soltero no tiene hijos, vive con el papá en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

Es integranbte de la VRC 27 DE OCTUBRE, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Santa Sofía, Perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, Esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, frejol gandul.

Cesar se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de máiz. Las compras y las ventas lo hace en ventanas.
Solicita el crédito para comprar insumos, fertilizantes, urea, líquidos.Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar los abonos agrícolas.
Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son las plagas. El sueño es poder seguir trabajando en la agricultura para poder sobrevivir.

En el tiempo libre le gusta trabajar aparte de la labor normal.
texts.en:
Cesar Augusto, age 35, is single and does not have children.  He lives with his father in the Ventanas Canton in the Ríos Province.

He is a member of the 27 de Octubre communal bank, which is located in the Santa Sofía precinct belonging to the Ventanas Canton.  This communal bank grows short cycle corn, rice, and pigeon peas. 

Cesar is a farmer, and he grows corn.  He makes his purchases and his sales in Ventanas.

He is requesting the loan to buy supplies, fertilizers, urea, and liquid fertilizers.  With the help of the loan he will be able to buy natural fertilizers for his crops.

The challenge that he faces is pest infestation.  His dream is to be able to continue farming in order to be able to survive.

In his free time he likes to work on things other than his normal work.

loans.use: to buy supplies, fertilizers, urea, and liquid fertilizers.

loans.name: Angel Vicente

texts.es:
Angel Vicente tiene 39 años de edad es casado tiene siete hijos. vive con la esposa y con los hijos en el cantón Ventanas provincia de los ríos. 

Es integranbte de la VRC 27 DE OCTUBR, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Santa Sofía, Perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, Esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, frejol gandul.

Angel se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz. Las compras y las ventas lo hace en ventanas. 

Solicita el crédito para comprar abonos, urea, fertilizantes, líquidos y seguir trabajando en la agricultura.
 Con el apoyo del crédito podrá comprar los insumos.

Los deasfíos a los que se enfrentya son las plagas y la variedad del clima.
el sueño es poder comprar terrenos para sembrar más maíz. En el tiempo libre le gusta practicar el deporte.
texts.en:
Angel Vicente is 39 years old. He is married and has seven children. He lives with his wife and children in Ventanas canton in Los Ríos province.

He is a member of the 27 de Octubre (October 27th) communal bank, located in the Santa Sofía precinct, Ventanas canton. The members of this communal bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn, rice, and pigeon peas.

Angel is a farmer and grows corn. He buys and sells in Ventanas.

He is asking for the loan to buy manure, urea, fertilizer, and liquid fertilizer, and to continue working in agriculture.  With the help of the loan, he will be able to buy supplies.

The challenges he faces are infestations and variations in climate. His dream is to be able to buy land to plant more corn. In his free time, he likes to play sports.

loans.use: to purchase manure, urea, fertilizer, and liquid fertilizer, and to continue working in agriculture

loans.name: Luis Humberto

texts.es:
Luis Humberto tiene 19 años de edad es soltero no tiene hijos, vive con los padres en ventanas provincia de los ríos.

Es integrante de la VRC 27 DE OCTUBR, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Santa Sofía, Perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, Esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, frejol gandul.

Luis se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz. las compras y las ventas lo hace en Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para comprar insumos, fertilizantes, urea, líquidos para los sembríos de maíz.Con la ayuda del crédito podra mejorar el estilo de vida y mejorar los ingresos.

Enfrenta desafíos como las plagas. El sueño es poder tener una finca. En el tiempo libre le guta jugar boli.
texts.en:
Luis Humberto is 19 years old.  He is single, has no children, and lives with his parents in Ventanas in the province of Los Ríos.

He is a member of the 27 de Octubre Communal Bank, which is located in the Santa Sofía area of the canton of Ventanas.  This communal bank deals with agricultural work, specifically short-cycle planting of corn, rice, and pigeon peas.

Luis works in agriculture for a living planting corn.  He buys and sells in Ventanas.

He is asking for this loan to buy supplies, fertilizers, urea, and liquids for his corn fields.  With the help of this loan, he will be able to improve his way of life and his earnings.

He faces challenges such as pests.  His dream is to be able to have a farm.  In his free time he likes to play volleyball.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as fertilizers, urea, and liquids for his corn fields

loans.name: Cesar Ramon

texts.es:
Cesar ramón tiene 41 años de edad es casado tiene dos hijos, vive con la esposa y con los hijos en Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

Es integranbte de la VRC 27 DE OCTUBR, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Santa Sofía, Perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, Esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, frejol gandul.
Cesar se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz.

Solicita el crédito para comprar fertilizantes, semillas, urea, líquidos. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar los abonos. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son las plagas en los cultivos y el mal tiempo.

El sueño es poder comprarse un terreno. En el tiempo libre le gusta viajar y pasear.
texts.en:
Cesar Ramón is 41 years old.  He is married with two children.  He lives with his wife and children in Ventanas in the province of Los Ríos.

He is a member of the 27 de Octubre Communal Bank, which is located in the Santa Sofía area of the canton of Ventanas.  This communal bank deals with agricultural work, specifically short growth cycle corn, rice, and pigeon pea crops. 

Cesar grows corn for a living.

He is asking for this loan to buy fertilizers, seeds, urea, and liquids.  With the help of this loan he will be able to buy fertilizers.  He faces challenges such as pests in his crops and bad weather.

His dream is to be able to buy land.  In his free time he likes to travel and go for walks.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, seeds, urea, and liquids

loans.name: William

texts.es: William tiene un negocio de papelería y  víveres en general en la ciudad de Bogotá, donde vive con su esposa y sus tres hijos en las edades de  13 a 21 años, su negocio inició hace 7 años con una tienda vendiendo  ranchos, víveres al detalle, gradualmente fue adicionando  artículos de papelería y con ello ha logrado generar los ingresos suficientes para el bienestar de su familia, pero necesita hacerlo crecer aun mas, porque sus hijos crecen y va a ofrecerles estudios superiores, que potencialicen su éxito futuro. Su mayor desafío para lograr su sueño familiar de prosperidad es que ante su gradual aumento de clientes, su capital es insuficiente para responder a esta demanda;  esta es la razón por la cual recurre a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará  útiles escolares, pues se acerca la temporada escolar y debe tener un surtido apropiado para esa época, que es de gran despliegue comercial y esto lo aprovechará, para vender mas, aumentar sus ingresos, garantizando así éxito en su inversión.
texts.en:
William has a stationery and general provisions business in the city of Bogotá where he lives with his wife and three children between the ages of 13 and 21.  He started his business seven years ago with a store selling snack foods and specific foods.  He was gradually adding stationery items, and with that he managed to generate enough income for his family’s well-being.

However, he needs to make it grow even more because his children are growing, and he wants to give them a higher education that will empower their successful future.

His biggest challenge is achieving the family dream of prosperity.  Facing the gradual increase in customers, he does not have enough capital to respond to this demand.  That is why he turns to a Kiva loan, his first loan with the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo.  He will use it to buy school supplies because the school season is approaching.  He needs to have the appropriate stock for this season.  He will take advantage of the great commercial roll-out in order to sell more, increase his income, and guarantee success in his investment.

loans.use: to buy school supplies.

loans.name: Flavio Jose

texts.es: Flavio José tiene 49 años de edad, es un emprendedor que inicio su propio negocio con capital propio que es una panadería que la tiene ubicada en su casa de habitación lo cual sus mayores clientes son vecinos de la zona y los alrededores. Flavio José es un emprendedor con éxito que a pesar de los obstáculos que se le presentaron en el camino pudo salir adelante con muchos esfuerzos y perseverancia para  cumplir sus sueños. Flavio José está solicitando crédito para invertir en el negocio en la compra de sartenes y mobiliario que necesita para la panadería y ofrecerles a sus clientes calidad en el servicio.
texts.en: Flavio José is 49 years old. He is an entrepreneur who started his own business with his own capital. His business is a bakery located in his house. His biggest clients are neighbors from the area and areas nearby. Flavio José is a successful entrepreneur. Despite the obstacles that faced him on the way, he was able to move forward with a lot of work and effort in order to realize his dreams. Flavio José is asking for the loan to invest in his business by purchasing frying pans and furniture that he needs for the bakery to offer his customers quality service.

loans.use: to purchase frying pans and furniture that he needs for the bakery

loans.name: La Gran Alianza Group

texts.es:
El socio Pertenece al banco comunal "LA GRAN ALIANZA"; Este banco se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la porvincia de Cusco y departamento Cusco.

El socio es el joven Meyer; el tiene 18 años de edad, es soltero y se dedica trabajar en un taller mecanico e sus horas libres y paralelamente a esto lleva sus estudios en el instituto superior Senati, el socio estudio la carrera de maecanica automotriz, y con su trabjao el paga sus estudios y en esta ocasión el socio desea invertir en la compra de sus materiales de estudio y d eeste modo seguir reforzando sus conocimientos, els ocio a futuro desea aprender todo respecto a automoviles y poner su propio taller  y convertirse en empresario. El socio solicita el prestamo para invertir en sus estudios. La socia  Buenaventura  esta a un costado de la foto porque ella estaba a cargo de la preparacion de bocaditos y llego tarde a ala reunion.
Los otros socios realizan diferentes actividades como venta de comidas, atencion de su tienda de abarrotes, venta de frutas y verduras, entre otros.

El socio se compromete en pagar todas sus cuotas en los plazos establecidos.
texts.en:
This member belongs to communal bank "La Gran Alianza" ("The Great Alliance"). The bank is located in the district of Huanchac, in the province of Cusco, deparment of Cusco.
The member is young Meyer. He's 18 years old, single and works in an auto repair shop. During his free time, he attends the Senati Institute of higher studies. The member studies auto mechanics and with his work he pays for his education. On this occasion, the member wishes to purchase his learning materials and therefore continue to bolster his knowledge. In the future he intends to learn all about automobiles, set up his own shop and become a businessman. The member wants the loan in order to invest in his studies.
The other members are in various business such as food sales, grocery store, fruits and vegetables sales, among others.
The member pledges to make all of his repayments according to the schedule.

loans.use: to pay for his professional studies.

loans.name: Carlos Eduardo

texts.es: Carlos de 45 años es un hombre casado, que tiene un taller de confecciones en la ciudad de Bogotá, con su buen desempeño en el mercado, ha logrado ser un proveedor de almacenes de grandes superficies; en su taller también hacen arreglos a la ropa de una clientela selecta, ubicada alrededor del lugar donde vive y tiene su negocio, a quien cuida ofreciéndole su mejor servicio. Gradualmente su negocio ha crecido y quiere ampliarlo diversificando su oferta de productos y su capital de trabajo se torna insuficiente ante este propósito. Esta es la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo,  con el cual comprará telas e insumos en mayor proporción, para lograr descuentos que trasladará a sus precios de venta; su meta mas adelante es lograr aumentar su clientela y también las posibilidades de emplear a mas personas, para que también generen ingresos que beneficien a sus familias.
texts.en: Carlos, 45, is a married man who has a tailoring workshop in the city of Bogotá.  With his good performance in the market, he has managed to become a supplier to the large retailers and department stores.  In his workshop, he also does repairs for a select clientele who live near the place where he has his home and his business, and to whom he offers his best service. Gradually, his business has grown, and he wants to expand it further by diversifying the products that he offers.  But his working capital is not sufficient to carry out this plan.  For this reason, he has applied for this Kiva loan, which will be the first financing that he has done through the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo.  With this loan, he will buy fabrics and supplies in bulk, so that he can obtain discounts that he can then pass along to his customers.  His goal for the future is to increase his customer base, which would give him the ability to hire more people, so that they can also generate incomes that will benefit their families.

loans.use: to buy fabric and sewing supplies in bulk

loans.name: Jonny Angel

texts.es:
EL señor Jonny es un hombre de 37 años que se dedica a la cerrajería durante todo el día para poder ayudar a su esposa en el pago de todos los gastos que necesita cubrir no solo para el hogar sino también para sus dos pequeños hijos, el mayor de 14 y el menor de 4 añitos. Actualmente se dedica a alquilar cuartos diariamente en la ciudad de Ica, lugar en donde tienen su negocio y hogar, esta ciudad se ha venido desarrollando económicamente progresivamente, lo que permite mejorar la calidad de vida de las personas que habitan esta calura y árida ciudad.

Jonny disfruta jugar al fútbol con sus hijos y amigos en sus tiempos libres, luego de sus partidos disfruta mucho comer una riquísima “Carapulcra”, plato típico de la ciudad de Chincha. Él sabe que su negocio está dando buenos resultados debido a la gran dedicación que le pone a su trabajo, pero sabe que los clientes siempre son más exigentes y para poder continuar satisfaciendo del todo sus necesidades a detectado que le hace falta implementar algunos materiales, es por esto que Jonny desea que los prestatarios Kiva puedan ayudarlo y así el pueda comprar las nuevas y mejoradas herramientas que necesita y también realizar la construcción de un pozo que es necesario para su labor diaria.

Jonny es consciente que solo poniendo mucho de su parte el logrará los sueños y objetivos que tiene personalmente y también con su pequeña familia, la misma que lo apoya mucho.
texts.en:
Jonny, 37, works all day doing metal work to help his wife pay expenses for what they need not only for their home but for their two young children, the oldest who is 14 and the youngest who is just 4.  He also rents out rooms in the city of Ica which is where they have their business and their home.  This city has been progressively developing economically which allows for better quality of life for people living in this arid, hot city.  Jonny enjoys playing soccer with his children and friends in his free time and after the games enjoys very much eating the very delicious “Carapulcra,” a traditional dish from the city of Chincha.  

He is aware that his business is producing good results because of the great dedication he puts into his work but he also knows that customers are more demanding every day and in order to continue to satisfy all their needs he’s noticed that he needs to get some supplies and this is why Jonny hopes that Kiva lenders can help him so that he can buy new and improved tools he needs as well as to build a well he needs for his daily work.  Jonny knows that only by putting much from his part into it will he reach the dreams and objectives that he has both personally and for his small family which supports him very much.

loans.use: to buy tools and to build a well.

loans.name: Gloria Vanessa

texts.es:
Gloria es una mujer de 29 años, actualmente es madre soltera pero esto no la ha detenido en el transcurso de su vida, al contrario la ha ayudado a fortalecerse como persona y principalmente como madre, Gloria tiene unos hijos uno de 10 y el mayor de 16, ella está encantada con ellos, los quiere mucho y siempre está al pendiente para darle lo mejor de ella y sobretodo constantemente platica con ellos, con la finalidad de ayudarlos por si tuviesen algún problema. Gloria es una mujer a la que le hubiese gustado ser profesora de educación; como buena peruana disfruta mucho de los platos que su país le ofrece, pero entre los que ella más disfruta es el “Ají de Gallina”, plato acompañado con arroz graneado. 

Gloria se dedica a la venta de abarrotes en un mercado de la ciudad de Mala, en el trabaja desde las 7 de la mañana hasta las 5 de la tarde, hora en la que la cantidad de clientes disminuye considerablemente, esta lucha diaria le permite poder tener un porcentaje del ingreso que necesita para los gastos diarios de la casa y también para comprar nuevamente mercadería, ella cree que su negocio tiene éxito porque siempre les brinda una muy buena atención, es amable y le brinda buenos precios a sus clientes. Gloria nos comentó que sus hijos fueron el principal motivo para incursionar en este negocio y ahora está muy feliz porque puede cuidarlos bien y le esta yendo bien en su negocio. Como muestra de su perseverancia ella también se dedica a repartir pollo a varias bodegas durante todas las mañanas, luego de ello recién se dedica a su pequeña tienda.

Esta gran mujer desea que los prestatarios Kiva puedan apoyarla y así poder comprar una moto-carga, lo que le permitirá disminuir sus gastos y con ese dinero extra, podrá brindarle la mejor educación que pueda a sus hijos. Con muchísimo esfuerzo ella podrá lograr cumplir su gran sueño “Distribuir pollo por otras zonas aledañas y darle estudios superiores a sus dos menores hijos”.
texts.en:
Gloria, 29, is a single mother but this hasn’t held her back on her life’s journey.  On the contrary, it’s strengthened her as a person and especially as a mother.  Gloria has two children, a ten-year-old and a 16-year-old.  She is enchanted by both of them; she loves them very much and is always careful to give them the best of her; above all, she always chats with them in order to help them if they have any problem.  Gloria is a woman who would have liked to be a teacher by profession.  Like all good Peruvians she enjoys the dishes the country has to offer but among the ones she likes best is “Ají de Gallina,” a dish served with rice.

Gloria sells groceries in a market in the city of Mala; she works from 7 in the morning until 5 in the afternoon which is when the number of customers decreases considerably.  This daily struggle allows her to have a certain percentage of income needed for her daily household expenses and also to buy new merchandise.  She believes that her business is successful because she always provides good service, she’s kind and the prices she offers her customers are good.  

Gloria told us that her children were the main motives for her to go into this business and now she’s happy because she can care for them well and she’s doing well in her business.  As a sign of her perseverance, she also sells chickens to various stores during the morning and then when she finishes doing that she takes care of her small store.

She is a great woman who hopes Kiva lenders will be able to help her to buy a motorcycle powered cargo van which will allow her to reduce costs and with the extra money be able to provide a better education for her children.  With a great deal of effort she’ll be able to reach her great dream: “To sell chicken in adjacent zones and to provide her two minor children with higher education.”

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle powered cargo van.

loans.name: Lisa Bonet

texts.es:
Lisa es una joven de 29 años, está casada y junto a su esposo tienen 2 hijas cuyas edades comprenden 9 meses y 3 años, ella esta muy feliz , nos comenta que es el mejor regalo que Dios le ha podido dar, ella vive en la ciudad de Mala, ciudad con extensiones las tierras agrícolas son de primera calidad, las cuales son completadas con aguas permanentes de regadío en donde destacan la presencia de canales de riego que tienen enorme incidencia en la producción y productividad agraria; Lisa en sus tiempos libres disfruta de jugar con sus hijas, porque eso la relaja y sobre todo porque la une mas a ellas, como buena peruana lisa ama nuestra comida, por ello uno d elos platos que a ella le gusta mucho es el riquísimo “estofado de pollo”; Lisa solo pudo estudiar hasta el quinto grado de educación secundaria ya que sus padres no tenían los suficientes medios económicos, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar para ser cosmetóloga.

Lisa tiene su restaurante y le dedica alrededor de 9 horas diarias, puede atender hasta 30 clientes por día, ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque tienen una  muy buena sazón para la preparación de los platillos y porque sus hijas son la fuerza que ella tiene para poder trabajar y hacerlo bien, ellas hacen que cada día tenga ánimos de luchar.

Lisa agradece mucho a los prestatarios kiva ya que gracias a su apoyo, ella podrá comprar una fotocopiadora ya que se encuentra al frente de su negocio una guardería y como se acerca el periodo escolar y siempre nenesitan realizar fotocopiados le permitiria tener un ingreso extra y así seguiría ahorrando para poder cumplir su más grande sueño:” Estudiar una carrera profesional y que sus hijas sean unas profesionales”.
texts.en:
Lisa, 29, is a young, married woman and together with her husband has two daughters who are 9 months old and 3 years old.  She is very happy.  She comments that they are the best gift God could have given her.  She lives in the city of Mala, a city with extensive, first quality agricultural fields which are complemented by irrigation systems where irrigation canals stand out and that are enormously productive agriculturally.

In her free time, Lisa enjoys playing with her daughters because that relaxes her and above all because it brings her closer to them.  Like all good Peruvians, Lisa loves our food and one of her favorite dishes is the very delicious “Estofado de Pollo.”  Lisa was only able to study up to fifth grade of secondary school because her parents’ lacked economic means but she would have liked to have studied to become a cosmetologist.

Lisa has a restaurant that she spends about 9 hours daily in and can take care of up to 30 customers per day.  She believes that she does well in her business because she makes tasty dishes and because her daughters give her strength to work and work well; they cause her to be more driven to work harder each day.

Lisa is very thankful to Kiva lenders because thanks to their support she will be able to buy a photocopier because across from her business there’s a daycare center and since the school term is about to start they always need to make copies and this will mean extra income for her so that she can continue saving up to reach her greatest dream: “To study a professional career and that her daughters become professionals.”

loans.use: to buy a photocopier.

loans.name: Alicia Paula

texts.es:
Alicia es una mujer que no se amilana ante nada, es madre y su hijo tiene15 años, el cual cursa el cuarto año de educación secundaria; al cual ha sacado adelante sola y por el cual se siente muy orgullosa, como buena peruana ama nuestra comida por ello uno de sus platos favoritos es el riquísimo “picante de Cuy”, en sus tiempos libres Alicia le gusta tejer y es muy buena por cierto, sobre todo cuando teje ropa de bebes, le sale precioso; ella solo estudio hasta el quinto grado de educación secundaria pero le hubiera gustado estudiar costura.

Alicia trabaja en su negocio de venta de abarrotes y productos de primera necesidad, trabaja alrededor de 12 horas en las cuales puede atender hasta 25 clientes, ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy atenta con ellos y porque ofrece productos de calidad.

Alicia agradece mucho a los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a su apoyo ella podrá  comprar una congeladora, ya hace mucho calor y las verduras o carnes pueden malograrse y  con esta mejora podrá conservar de manera optima sus productos y los clientes se sentirán más seguros y tendrán mas confianza en comprar los productos que ella ofrece, así tendrá mas ingresos y podrá seguir ahorrando para poder cumplir su gran sueño:” Darle una profesión a su hija y mejorar su calidad de vida”.
texts.en:
Alicia is a woman who nothing discourages.  She’s a mother and her son is 15 years old attending fourth year of secondary school.  She has raised him by herself and she’s very proud of that.  Like a good Peruvian, she loves our food and one of her favorite dishes is “Picante de Cuy.”  In her free time, Alicia likes to knit and she’s quite good at it as a matter of fact, especially when she knits clothes for babies they turn out beautifully.  She only studied up to fifth grade of secondary school but she would have liked to have studied sewing.

Alicia works at her business selling groceries and basic staple items about 12 hours daily and can take care of up to 25 customers.  She believes that she does well in her business because she’s very attentive to her customers and because she offers quality products.

Alicia is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to their support she will be able to buy a freezer.  It’s already very hot and vegetables and meats can spoil.  With this improvement, she will be able to store her products under optimal conditions and her customers will feel more secure and confident in buying the products she offers and she will earn more income so that she can continue to save up to reach her great dream: “To provide her daughter with a profession and to improve her quality of life.”

loans.use: to buy a freezer.

loans.name: Issa

texts.fr:
Monsieur Issa est un menuisier ébéniste, âgé de 44 ans qui exerce ce métier depuis 14 ans. Il a deux épouses qui vivent ensemble et leurs enfants.
Avec le prêt il veut acheter du bois pour fabriquer des bancs et pouvoir les revendre lors du Gamou de Tivaouane qui est un événement religieux qui rassemble bocoup de monde et d’opportunités commerciales.
Monsieur Issa est chef de famille et donc subvient aux besoins quotidiens de son foyer et à l’éducation de ses enfants.
Dans l’avenir il aimerait bocoup agrandir son atelier et être plus autonome financièrement.
texts.en:
Mr. Issa is a 44-year-old carpenter and cabinetmaker who has been practicing this profession for 14 years. He has two wives, and they all live together with their children. 

With this loan, Mr. Issa intends to buy lumber, which he will use to make benches to be sold for the Gamou of Tivaouane celebration, a religious event that attracts large crowds and allows for numerous business opportunities.

Mr. Issa is a family head who is responsible for the daily household expenses and for his children’s education. His goals for the future are to expand his workshop and become more self-sufficient financially.

loans.use: to buy lumber to make benches for sale.

loans.name: Alfredo

texts.es: Alfredo invirtió su credikiva en la compra al por mayor y de contado de víveres abarrotes y productos de aseo. Está muy satisfecho porque como la tienda está ubicada muy bien comercialmente, está haciendo sus mejor es ventas y por eso va a comprar nuevamente víveres, ranchos, licores para prepararse en la temporada carnavalera que se acerca y sus cliente también hacen sus comprar en mas cantidades para las fiestas. Esta es la razón por la cual acude a su segundo credikiva y planea que esta inversión nuevamente tenga éxito. “Muchos agradecimientos a Kiva y a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, deseo que nos sigan apoyando como hasta ahora.”
texts.en:
Alfredo used his Kiva loan to pay cash for wholesale purchases of groceries and cleaning supplies.  He’s very satisfied because since the store is very well located commercially, his sales are improving and this is why he is once again going to buy groceries, snacks and liquor to prepare for Carnival season which is approaching and which is a time when his customers buy larger amounts for their parties.

This is the reason why he’s calling upon his second Kiva loan and he expects that this investment will once again be successful.  “Many thanks to Kiva and to Fundación Mario Santo Domingo; I hope you will continue to support us like you’ve done to date.”

loans.use: to buy groceries, snacks and liquor.

loans.name: Nila Esther

texts.es: Nila  compró calzado ropa y variedades según pedido de sus clientes, por eso rotó sus inventarios rápidamente. Su meta más adelante es tener su propia casa y está entusiasmada . En la actualidad requiere un fondo de efectivo para responder a la demanda que se acerca en la época de carnavales, temporada en la cual se incrementan sus ventas y ella como siempre la aprovechará para responder a asus clientes con lo que ellos le piden. Esta es la razón de su segundo credikiva con el cual comprará cosméticos, electrodomésticos menores variedades de ariculos femeninos. Su mensaje a los financiadores es el siguiente: "Estoy muy agradecida con Kiva y la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, deseo seguir contando con su apoyo finaciero para continuar progresando en mi negocio y con mi familia. "
texts.en:
Nila bought shoes and novelties according to customer orders and that’s why her inventory turned over quickly.  Her goal for later on is to own a house and she’s excited about this.  She currently needs cash to respond to demand due to the approaching Carnival season which is when sales increase and she, as always, wants to be ready to respond to her customers’ wishes.  

This is the reason behind her second Kiva loan request which she’ll use to buy cosmetics, small appliances and an assortment of women’s items.  Her message to Kiva lenders is the following:  “I am very grateful to Kiva and to Fundación Mario Santo Domingo and would like to continue to count on your financial support to continue making progress in my business and with my family.”

loans.use: to buy cosmetics, small appliances and an assortment of women's items.

loans.name: Hussein

texts.en:
Hussein is a 43-year-old married man and father of three children. He works hard to provide his family with a good and healthy lifestyle.

Hussein is a hardworking man.  Eight years ago, he opened a special candy store, and through Al Majmoua loans, his business is improving more and more. Hussein has been an Al Majmoua borrower for six consecutive cycles. All his previous loans were invested in increasing his business capital.

Today, Hussein is applying for a loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua in order to purchase more products with special encouraging prices. Hussein works hard to provide the best education possible for his children and to run his business in a professional way with the goal of starting a wholesale business.

loans.use: To purchase more candies & merchandise with special offers.

loans.name: Imad

texts.en:
Imad has been working at cultivating his land for 14 years. He is a 27-year-old man who lives in Marjeyoun, southern Lebanon. Imad is known for his good work, and good reputation. His produce is high quality, and he always works hard to sell it at competitive prices affordable to anyone.

Imad was already an Al Majmoua "Kiva Partner" borrower for one cycle. With his last loan Imad was capable of purchasing an irrigation system necessary for his business. Most of his clients are his friends, neighbors and people from his region.

Today, Imad is requesting a Youth loan from Al Majmoua in order to purchase a new plowing machine & plants for his business. Imad is a borrower in good standing, and he always plans on expanding his business more & more.

loans.use: To purchase a new plowing machine & plants.

loans.name: Samira

texts.en:
Samira is a 52-year-old widow. She lived her whole life raising her four children because her husband passed away.

Samira opened a grocery store 22 years ago. This is her only source for living and covering her children expenses. She is a hardworking woman with a very good reputation. She works hard to improve her family's social and financial situation by improving her business.

Samira was introduced to Kiva partner Al Majmoua through her loyal customers in order to apply for as loan to invest in improving her business.

But Samira thought of something bigger than improving her store: she is planning to start a new business with the money she's going to get. She will open a mobile shop and let her older daughter take full responsibility in managing it. Samira will supervise and teach her daughter the best way to attract customers, and how to keep them loyal. She will make sure that this loan sprouts another project in the future.

loans.use: to start a new business.

loans.name: Mohamad

texts.en:
Mohamad is a 29-year-old single man, and he has worked in transportation for 12 years. He is a hardworking man. In 2010 he bought his own van to start transporting students to and from school. His business is just going on fine. It's his reputation that gives him his customers' trust & support.

Mohamad wants to do necessary maintenance to his van to keep it in good shape for the sake of his customers' relaxation & comfort. That's why he applied for a Youth loan from Kiva partner, Al Majmoua. It's his first time to take on such a challenge.

He is planning to start taking touristic visits in the summer, and hopes to open a special transporting company in the future.

loans.use: To do necessary maintenance on his van.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase submersible cable.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es: Maria  de 46 años de edad, vive en el municipio de Soledad con su esposo y sus 3 hijos en las edades de 16 a 22  años;  ella se dedica a vender mercancía variada, especialmente calzado, bolsos y ropa. Adicionalmente vende en la puerta de su casa,  comidas rápidas y desde hace 2 años repuestos, lavadoras y neveras. Su experiencia le ha enseñado a tener todo lo que su clientela solicita; para identificar sus líneas de mercancías, está muy pendiente de que cosas le piden que ella no tiene y tomando nota las compra y así  va construyendo su propio mercado. Su negocio de mercancía, de repuestos y neveras lo realiza diario y a crédito y algunas veces de contado, mientras los fines de semana se dedica a vender hamburguesas, chuzos y otras delicias para obtener ingresos adicionales muy rápidamente y oxigenar los dos negocios. En la actualidad se prepara para la época venidera, “el Carnaval” en la cual hay derroche de alegría y de dinero y ella lo aprovecha para hacer su mejor venta, pero gran parte de su capital de trabajo está en manos de sus clientes que le compraron a crédito, por eso no es suficiente para responder a la demanda y   se acercó a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo para aplicar a un credikiva,  con el  comprará ropa, calzado, e insumos para sus alimentos, inversión que será exitosa, porque responde a su mercado y al vender mas productos su rentabilidad, lo mismo que sus ingresos se incrementan. Su meta es hacer prosperar su negocio y su mayor deseo es que su familia siempre se mantenga unida.
texts.en:
Maria, 46, lives in the city of Soledad with her husband and 3 children, ages 16 to 22. She sells a variety of merchandise, especially footwear, bags and clothing. In addition, she sells fast food in the doorway of her house. Two years ago she also began selling repair parts, washing machines and refrigerators.  Experience has taught her to accommodate her customers’ requests: in order to identify her lines of merchandise she keeps an eye on the things they request that she does not have in stock, and, making a note of them, she buys these items and in this way constructs her own marketplace. She operates her merchandise business every day, offering either credit or an installment plan, while she sells fast food, such as hamburgers, skewered meat and other treats on weekends in order to earn additional income quickly and energize both businesses.

Currently she is getting ready for the coming Carnival season when people are happy and spend money lavishly, a situation she capitalizes on to make her best sales. Nevertheless a large part of her working capital is in the hands of her customers who bought on credit so that she does not have enough available to adequately respond to the demand. Consequently she approached the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo to apply for a Kiva loan. She will use it to buy clothing, footwear and supplies for her food business, an investment that will be successful because she responds to demand and the more she sells the greater her earnings and profit. 

Her goal is for her business to prosper and her greatest desire is that her family will always remain united

loans.use: to buy clothing, footwear and supplies for her food business

loans.name: Diego

texts.es: Diego, tiene la edad  de 27 años, está casado,  vive  con su hijo y su esposo que son su prioridad. El con el crédito pretende comprar colonias y ropa para la venta de esta mercadería a sus clientes. El actualmente se desempeña como vendedor a domicilio y tiene varios años de trabajar en eso por lo cual ya cuenta con una clientela fija. El quiere darle a sus clientes un mejor surtido de productos para la compra y así satisfacer sus necesidades. El tiene como meta aumentar sus ventas y generar más ingresos para su bienestar familiar y una estabilidad económica mejor para su futuro y al de su familia. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Diego, 27, is married and lives with his son and wife who are his priority.  He intends to use the loan to buy cologne and clothes to sell to his customers.  He currently works as a door to door salesman so he has a fixed clientele.  He wants to offer his customers a wider selection of products to buy and thus meet their needs.  His goal is to increase sales and generate more income for his family’s wellbeing and for future economic stability for him and his family.  This is his first Fudecosur loan.  He’s had no previous loans with state banks and Fudecosur has provided the best terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy clothes and cologne.

loans.name: Hector Miguel

texts.es:
Héctor, se dedica a atender una foto estudio, vive en casa propia junto a su esposa y un hijo, él administra su negocio desde hace mucho tiempo, pues lo aprendió muy joven, atiende para fotografías y tambien trabaja con resina, de lunes a domingo y en eventos sociales.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de playwood y resina,para tener materiales para seguir con su trabajo, esta compra le ayudara porque al comprar de contado obtendrá mejores precios.
Él tiene como objetivo mejorar el salón de foto estudio, ya que con este negocio ha logrado mantener a su familia.
texts.en:
Héctor runs his photography studio. He lives in his own house with his wife and son.  He has operated his business for a very long time having learned it while still very young.  He takes photos and also works with resin from Monday to Sunday and at social events.

He is asking for a loan to buy plywood and resin to have the materials he needs to continue with his work; this purchase will help him because by paying cash he’ll get better prices.  His goal is to improve his photographic salon since he’s been able to support his family with this business.

loans.use: to buy plywood and resin.

loans.name: Martha

texts.es: Martha con su credikiva compró materiales e insumos  para producir vestidos encargados que vendió y le fue muy bien; en la actualidad está aplicando a su segundo credikiva, para invertir especialmente en telas, hilos, accesorios, para hacer disfraces, pues sus clientes quieren disfrutar el carnaval con todo el derroche de alegría y folclor de lo que son capaces. Su mensaje a los financiadores de Kiva es el siguiente: “Ustedes son una gran ayuda para la microempresa,  ya que con esta se trabaja mejor. Muchas gracias”
texts.en: Martha used her Kiva loan to buy supplies and materials to make dresses she had on order; she sold them and did quite well.  She’s now applying for her second Kiva loan specifically to invest in fabric, thread and accessories to make costumes because her customers want to enjoy Carnival with all the over-the-top joy and folklore they are capable of.  Her message to Kiva lenders is the following:  “You are a great help for micro business because with it one can work better.  Thank you very much.”

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread and accessories to make costumes.

loans.name: Ysela Ana

texts.es:
Ysela es una mujer muy luchadora, la cual vive en la ciudad de imperial, ciudad con extensiones las tierras agrícolas son de primera calidad, las cuales son completadas con aguas permanentes de regadío en donde destacan la presencia de canales de riego que tienen enorme incidencia en la producción y productividad agraria; Ysela le encanta cocinar y uno de sus platos favoritos es el riquísimo Lomo Saltado; como sus padres no tenían los suficientes medios económicos, Ysela solo pudo estudiar hasta el quinto grado de educación secundaria, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar gastronomía.

Ysela tiene su propio restaurante, al cual le dedica alrededor de 9 horas diarias en las cuales puede atender hasta 25 clientes diariamente, ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque prepara de manera deliciosa los platillos y por ello sus clientes siempre vienen a su negocio.

Ysela está muy contenta y sobre todo agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a su ayuda ella podrá mejorar su negocio comprando mas utensilios como cubiertos, platos , sillas, mesas entre otros, con esta mejora podrá dar un mejor servicio para sus clientes, con lo cual sus clientes se sentirán mas satisfechos y seguirán frecuentando su negocio, generándole más ingresos para que pueda seguir ahorrando y cumplir su más grande sueño:”Tener otro restaurante y brindar una carta especial de comidas”.
texts.en:
Ysela is a determined woman who lives in the imperial city which has top quality agricultural fields and has completed irrigation canals that have an enormous impact on the production and productivity of its farms.

  Ysela loves to cook and one of her favorite dishes is the delicious “Lomo Saltado” (a Peruvian dish of strips of marinated meat cooked with special vegetables).  Since her parents didn’t have much money, she was only able to go through the fifth grade but she would have loved to have studied gastronomy.
Ysela has her own restaurant where she works around 9 hours every day to take care of  up to 25 customers daily.  She feels that the business is going well because she prepares delicious dishes and that is why her customers always come to her business.

Ysela is very happy and especially grateful for the Kiva loans.  Thanks to their help she will be able to improve her business by buying more items such as flatware, plates, chairs, tables and more.  These will allow her to give her customers better service and they will feel more satisfied and continue coming to her business.  All this will generate more earnings so she can continue saving and fulfill her biggest dream “to have another restaurant and to offer a special meal menu ”.

loans.use: to buy chairs, tables and dishes

loans.name: Silvia Guadalupe

texts.es:
Silvia, vive con sus padres  y hermanos, es madre soltera de dos hijos, tiene un año de estar trabajando como cajera de una tienda, después de sus labores ayuda a su madre para la elaboración de tamales para vender.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de elotes para hacer tamales, aceite y manteca, estos materiales le ayudaran a realizar la venta obteniendo los materiales necesarios.
Su aspiración es tener la facilidad de continuar generando ventas, que ayuden a que su madre tenga ingresos para el hogar, ya que así es un aporte adicional al de ella.
texts.en:
Silvia lives with her parents and siblings. She is the single mother of two children. She has been working for a year as a cashier in a store. 

After work she helps her mother to prepare tamales to sell.

She is asking for a loan in order to buy corn to make tamales, oil and butter. These materials will help her make sales by having the necessary items.

Her intent is to have the ability to continue generating sales, helping her mother have income for the house, as this is an additional contribution towards it.

loans.use: to buy corn to make tamales, oil, and butter

loans.name: Ana  Luisa

texts.es:
La señorita  Ana Luisa  se dedica a la venta  de ropa y a la venta de dulces de cuyul que es una fruta dulce redonda que se da en los rios, desde hace tres años y a la venta de ropa desde hace cinco años.
Tiene 22 años de edad ella nos cuenta que le gusta mucho su negocio por que le deja buenas ganancias y puede ayudar a su familia.
Lo que mas le gusta  de la venta de dulces es que en la tarde saca una mesa de dulces para que los niños que salen a jugar le compren ya que vive cerca de una cancha de fútbol.
Pidió el préstamo lo usará para la  compra de ropa para niño, dama  y caballero, ya que es en este negocio donde necesita inversión..
Le da las gracias a fundación por ayudar a los jóvenes emprendedores
texts.en:
Miss Ana Luisa makes a living selling clothing and sweets made for cuyul, which is a sweet, round fruit that grows in the rivers.  She has been selling the sweets for three years and the clothing for five years.

She is 22 years old.  She states that she likes her business very much because it gives her good income and allows her to help her family.  What she  likes most about the selling of the sweets is that in the afternoons she puts out a table of sweets so that the children that go out to play can buy them,  since she lives near a soccer field.

She will use the requested loan to buy clothing for children, women and men because in this part of her business she needs to increase her investment.

She thanks the foundation for the help it gives to young entrepreneurs.

loans.use: to purchase clothing for resale.

loans.name: Paulina

texts.es:
Paulina, se dedica a la venta de tortillas, vive con su hija y dos nietos, ella se dedica a este negocio desde hace 10 años, con la intensión de tener un ingreso para ayudar a su familia, las ventas las realiza en su casa, ya que ahí llegan los clientes a comprarle.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de leña y maíz, que son lo materiales para elaborar las tortillas, con el dinero del préstamo cubrirá el gasto y tendrá lo necesario para la venta.
El objetivo de Paulina es no descuidarse del negocio, ir invirtiendo para crecer  y mejorar, con la idea que así sea mejor la condición para su familia.
texts.en:
Paulina sells tortillas. She lives with her daughter and two grandchildren. She has been working in this business for ten years, with the intention of having an income to help her family. The sales are made from her house and that is where the customers come to buy them.

She is asking for a loan to buy wood and corn, which is what she uses to make tortillas, and with the money from the loan she will cover the expense of the necessary things to sell.

Paulina’s objective is not to neglect the business, to go on investing in order to grow and improve with the idea that it would be best for the family wellbeing.

loans.use: to buy wood and corn

loans.name: Maria Elisa

texts.es:
María, vive con su esposo y dos hijos, ella administra una tienda de productos básicos, lo inicio en su casa de habitación, en la zona no existen muchas, esto le permite tener abundantes clientes, su horario de atención no es estable, porque depende de las circunstancias y necesidades de los clientes.
Ella comprara arroz, aceite, azúcar, huevo, frijoles, para esto solicita un préstamo que cubra su inversión, permitiéndole ampliar y tener mayor disponibilidad para atender la demanda.
La aspiración de María es fortalecer el negocio con esta inversión, que sus clientes se encuentren satisfechos con su servicio y tener rentabilidad en sus ventas.
texts.en:
María lives with her husband and two children. 

She runs a general store. She opened it in her home, and as in her area there are not many, it allows her to have a lot of clients. Her schedule is not fixed because it depends on circumstances and the needs of her clients.

She will buy rice, oil, sugar, eggs, and beans so she is asking for a loan to cover this investment, permitting her to expand and to have better resources in order to meet the requests.

María’s aim is to strengthen the business with this investment and satisfy her customers with her service and to have profitability in her sales.

loans.use: to buy rice, oil, sugar, eggs, and beans

loans.name: Ines Lourdes

texts.es:
La  señora Inés Lourdes es una señora trabajadora  creativa que le gusta salir adelante y esforzarse para poder darle una mejor vida a sus tres hijos.
Esta felizmente casada con el señor Agustín un señor trabajador que la apoya en lo que necesite.
Ella se dedica a la venta de antojitos mexicanos como son: enchiladas , entomatadas, tacos dorados y empanadas de pollo.
También se dedica a la venta de  calzado para dama  y para niños.
Ella pidió el préstamo para la compra de mas calzado para dama  ya que es  de lo que obtiene mas ganancias.
Le da las gracias a fundación por ayudarla para que pueda seguir trabajando.
texts.en:
Mrs.Inés Lourdes is a hard working and creative woman who likes to get ahead and tries very hard to give her three children a better life.
She is happily married with Mr. Agustin, a hard working man that supports her whenever needed.
She sells Mexican snacks such as enchiladas, entomatadas, tacos and chicken empanadas.
She also sells shoes for women and children.
She is requesting the loan to buy more women's shoes since these bring her more income.
She thanks the foundation for their help in allowing her to continue working.

loans.use: to purchase shoes for resale.

loans.name: Cristina Virginia

texts.es:
La señora cristina Virginia   es una señora trabajadora que se dedica a la venta de bolsas y cosméticos  por catalogo desde hace un año.
También se dedica a la venta de malteadas desde hace tres años , ella nos cuenta que le gusta mucho vender  bolsas para dama ya que le deja buenas ganancias .
Esta felizmente  casada con el señor Raúl un señor trabajador que le gusta mucho la venta de malteadas, y se vende mas de chocolate.
Ella pidió el préstamo para la compra de bolsas para dama e ingredientes para la elaboración de malteadas como son: leche,chocolate,frutas popotes ,vasos y lechera.
Le da las gracias a fundación por ayudarla a salir adelante y así poder hacer mas grande su negocio.
texts.en: Cristina Virginia is a hard working woman who has been selling women's handbags and cosmetics by catalog for about a year now.  She has also prepared and sold milkshakes for the last 3 years.   Cristina tells us she likes the handbag business because it brings her good income.  She is happily married to Raul, who enjoys their milkshake business.  She is requesting a loan to purchase more handbags, as well as ingredients they use in their shakes, such as chocolate, fruit, glasses and milk.   Cristina is grateful to the foundation for helping them improve the quality of life by growing their businesses.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients used to prepare milkshakes, as well as purchase handbags for resale.

loans.name: Virginia  Ines

texts.es:
La señora Virginia Inés es una señora trabajadora que se dedica a la venta de  dulces por mayoreo y por menudeo.
Ella nos  cuenta que lo que mas le gusta de su negocio es atender a sus clientes que son los niños traviesos .
Esta felizmente casada  con el señor Marco Herminio un señor trabajador y amable quien le ayuda aponer su puesto de dulces,.
Ella pidió el préstamo para la compra de  mas dulces para la venta .
Le da las gracias a fundación por ayudarla par que pueda hacer crecer mas su negocio que es una de las cosas que mas quiere.
texts.en: Virginia is a hard working woman who sells sweets from her small shop.   She tells us what she likes most about her business is being able take care of her customers, especially the naughty children.   Virginia is happily married to Marco, a friendly and hard working man who helps Virginia with her small shop.   She is grateful to the foundation for helping her grow her business, as it's one of the most important things for Virginia.

loans.use: to purchase sweets for her small shop

loans.name: Juan Angel

texts.es:
Juan, es agricultor, vive con sus seis hijos y su esposa, él siembra maíz y frijol, también la crianza de ganado, todos los días desde muy temprano atiende su ocupaciones agrícolas, este oficio lo aprendió por su padre, con lo que ha podido mantener a su familia.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de concentrado y harinilla para la granja, vitaminas, desparacitantes, con esta compra ayudara a mantener su ganado bien sano, mejorando su producción leche.
La aspiración de Juan es tener lo mejor en la granja, poder ayudar a su familia con lo mejor para el hogar.
texts.en:
Juan is a farmer. He lives with his six children and his wife. He grows corn and beans, and he also raises cattle. Every day, very early he tends to his agricultural duties. He learned this occupation from his father, which is how he has supported his family.

He is asking for a loan in order to buy concentrate (food pellets) and middling (coarsely ground wheat mixed with bran) for the farm, vitamins, and antiparasitic medications. With this purchase he will help to maintain his cattle in good heath, improving his milk production.

Juan’s aim is to have the best farm, to be able to help his family with what is best for the home.

loans.use: to buy concentrate (food pellets) and middling (coarsely ground wheat mixed with bran), vitamins, and antiparasitic medications

loans.name: Sedjro Djidje Tokpota Group

texts.fr: Le groupe SEDJRO DJIDJE TOKPOTA est formé de trois personnes qui habitent dans le même quartier. La représentante  de ce groupe, nommée Esther, est celle dont la main est levée sur la photo. C’est la sixième fois que ce groupe sollicite l’appui financier de ALIDé en vue d’élever le niveau de leur activité. Esther est âgée de 34 ans et est mariée à un certain Bonaventure. Le couple a deux enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Esther vit ensemble avec ses enfants et son mari. Esther a arrêté l'école au cours secondaire. Il y a environs huit ans que Esther exerce comme activité, la vente de charbon de bois dans sa région ; ce qui lui permet de répondre sans grande difficulté aux besoins de ses enfants et de subvenir à ses besoins. Dans le souci de renforcer davantage son activité et de mieux répondre aux exigences de sa clientèle, Esther désire augmenter le stock de ses produits. Pour ce faire, Esther sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe SEDJRO DJIDJE TOKPOTA, un sixième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les crédits précédents ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
The group SEDJRO DJIDJE TOKPOTA is comprised of three persons who live in the same district. The group's representative, named Esther, is the one with her hand raised in the photo. This is he sixth time this group has requested financial support from ALIDé for boosting their business. 

Esther is 34 years old and married to a man named Bonaventure. They have two children, both in school, and in their care. And she lives together with her children and husband. 

Esther halted her studies in secondary school. For about eight years she has had a business selling charcoal in her region. This enables her to meet the needs of her childen, as well as her own, without much difficulty. 

Concerned about bolstering her business further and responding to customer demands, Esther would like to increase her stock of goods. To do so, she and the other members of the group SEDJRO DJIDJE TOKPOTA are requesting a sixth loan from ALIDé. The preceding loans have indeed been repaid.

loans.use: to buy sacks of charcoal

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
Julia, se dedica a la crianza de ganado, cerdos y aves de corral, vive con su familia, su esposo y siete hijos, ella atiende desde temprano a realizar labores del hogar y atender la granja, esta ocupación le ayuda a Julia a mantenerse ocupada y ganar dinero por la venta de sus animales.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de harinilla y concentrado, para alimentar al ganado, a los cerdos y gallinas, el préstamo le ayudara a tener lo suficiente en cuestión de alimento, para un buen tiempo.
El sueño de Julia es mejorar su granja, ampliarse, para aspirar a mejores ventas y ganancias para su familia.
texts.en:
Julia raises cattle, pigs and poultry. She lives with her family, her husband and seven children. She attends to her house duties from early morning, and tends the farm. This works helps Julia to keep herself busy and to earn money by the sale of the animals.
